Short, double-breasted coat in felted fabric with a collar, decorative pocket flaps at the front, seam under the bust and single back vent. Lined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short waistcoat in soft leather with a deep V-neck and decorative stitching on the shoulders. Wrapover front and wide straps that fasten with a metal buckle at the back. Lined.

Shoulder bag in woven fabric with a sheen. Adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top and two zipped outer compartments. Lined. Size approx. 4x15x21 cm.

Fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and zipped front pockets for safe storage of valuables. Extra-long sleeves with thumbholes to help keep you warm while exercising outside. The sleeves are in a raglan cut to minimise the risk of friction from the seams.

Sports top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wide turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a taped zip at the front and an elasticated hem. Medium support.

Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Integral bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and covered elastication at the hem.

Sleeveless sports bodysuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a high neckline at the front and low-cut back. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the bodysuit is recycled.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the sides, a zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, and a flap back pocket with a press-stud. Reinforced at the back, knees and hems, with snow flaps at the hems. Lined. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Dress in soft, fine-knit, organic cotton with a lace-knit section at the top. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, long sleeves, and a lace-knit section at the hem.
Padded earmuffs in soft faux fur with a velour-covered plastic headband and glittery appliqués at the top.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative seam at the front and metal buckle at the top. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 1.8 cm.
